author: jsli.
content: Are there any suggestions on how to obtain the historical contents of forked blocks?

author: rabia7933
content: how the data shards in ethereum is solving the data availability problem of rollups? will it handle the smart contract data too?

content: The data layer is agnostic to whatever people want to put on it

author: djrtwo
content: And rollups will likely put block data or some sort of diffs, depending on the construction
